website_summaries.verdict: Women are perhaps the biggest fans of this safety razor, which fits the hand well and is great for close detailing, but it’s a great starter razor for anyone.
pros: Slightly longer than standard handle improves grip and control
Helpful customer service that walks new users through the setup process
Gives a close, smooth shave for most users
cons: Handle can be slippery when used in the shower
Exposed razor edge can cause nicks
Gold finish tends to wear off quickly

customer_reviews.title: Close comfortable shave
customer_reviews.text: I own four Merkurs, two Parkers and a Jagger razors, Bigfoot shaves as good if not better than all of the others. I have shaved twice with Taylor of Bomd St. shave cream, the Balli blade sent with Bigfoot and of course Bigfoot. I have no idea why they call it Bigfoot as the razor is fairly light and extremely comfortable to hold, the handle is a little longer than the standard razor and easy to manipulate on your face. Best of all is the shave close comfortable and smooth with no razor burn, a delightful beginning to any day.
customer_reviews.author: tonyb

customer_reviews.title: better than average travel razor.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for travel because of the shape of the head (flat) it was a surprise the quality of the shave I got. I got a BBS without any against the grain strokes! it was very maneuverable and gave me a great shave in sensitive areas. There was very little touch up and no razor burn. I did use a Parker blade instead of the mild blades that came with it. The two piece head has slip notches that keep the blade in place. Both pieces are very light and thin. Not sure what they are made of but this is a travel razor.
customer_reviews.author: Lou H

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like and use this product, but at the end of the day, it wasn't for me. I was looking to save money and get into one blade shaving, as I shave my face and scalp. I used this a few times before I decided I didn't like the constant battle wounds. Overall, the design was great and it felt nice in the hand. The blades were thin but sharp. The handle was a little short for me. I just could not get it to work for me, even with quality lather, due to my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: A great safety razor
customer_reviews.text: I love this razor even better than their butterfly version. It gives a close shaving with little or no irritation. However, there is an issue that prevents it from getting 5 starts and that is the edge of the razor is exposed and while not as sharp as the cutting edge, it can still cut be careful when changing cutting edges. Also a tip for those just beginning safety razor shaving, do yourself a favor and invest in a pre-shave oil/cream and a variety pack of razors to get the best one for you. The razors blades that are including mild and did a great job (for reference, I have very course hair).
customer_reviews.author: Alexandros M. Collie

customer_reviews.title: It could be better
customer_reviews.text: I thought the brand name "Bigfoot" would offer a shaver with a longer bigger handle. Wrong. It is a shaver that works well, except for the blades that are shipped with the shaver. The blades give one shave then become so dull that they must be changed. It's not what I expected, but gives me the opportunity to shave like I did when I served in the 'Nam. Good memories are restored, except for the feminine handle. The blades are junk at best, but I will live with the short handle, or improvise, adapt, and overcome by adding something that extents the length of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Padre

customer_reviews.title: Ladies please read - Great for the Nether regions
customer_reviews.text: "Ladies...please read" Never used a razor for legs/underarms (blonde). But! I do shave my Nether regions for obvious reasons. I decided to go greener, decrease my carbon footprint and purchase this piece of art to use for my personal nether region area and was amazed at how amazingly efficient it was! - albiet I was a bit reticent - But - No cuts or Nick's - (absolutely needed for your soft parts!) does not take much pressure to use.. No razor burn, bumps and No itchy regrowth, which is a miracle of you ask me. Classy razor !
customer_reviews.author: C Hull

customer_reviews.title: Tried and True Quality
customer_reviews.text: The fake hype campaign shaving companies use to sell their fancy and costly razors and razor blades has always amused me. There’s a sucker around every corner. But, since finding a simple safety razor in a store is impossible now days, I had to follow suit, and play along. This razor has near 100 years of production and proof by one or another company. It is tried and true. Put a good quality blade in it, and all these fancy razors cannot compete. It’s of a simple solid construction that’ll last a life time of shaves. What more do you want?
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: Great Razor but use good blades.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wet shaving for several years. I wanted to replace my butterfly razor with a three piece. I don't think I could have made a better choice, especially considering the price. The weight and feel are superb. However, do yourself a favor and invest in some good blades when you buy this razor. The blade included with the sale are inferior. When I tried my first shave with this razor, the blades pulled and didn't cut well at all. After changing the blades to my instock German made blades, I got a clean, close, comfortable and smooth shave. The razor is great, but the blades that come with it suck.
customer_reviews.author: Florida cracker

customer_reviews.title: Another one for the ladies
customer_reviews.text: I like many others bought this to make save money and the environment. I looked at a lot of them and the honest reason I chose this one was the pretty color. But I'm so happy I made that choice. It's lovely, it works well, and it's easy to change the blade. I'm very happy with my purchase. But for the ladies I would be careful those first few times around the thighs (straighten your leg completely) and bikini areas. It's easy enough to get used to but make sure you get the hang of it and go slow.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy H

customer_reviews.title: I recommend you watch some YouTube videos and shave when not ...
customer_reviews.text: Baught this as a gift. He loves it and feels it is very high quality. I wish it would have came with a DVD or larger instructions. It takes a long time to get the hang of. Lots of practice and you have to shave very slowly as first. I recommend you watch some YouTube videos and shave when not rushed the first several times. One you do get the hang of it though, you will be able to have a very close shave. It is also much more cost efficient than disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Harmon

customer_reviews.title: shaving has been quite an experience like I should've done this a few years ago

This razor has quality behind the materials and did I mention shine??? Will definitely buy again! Oh, and I think having a variety of color schemes would do well too? Just a suggestion.

I've never used a safety razor before I got this one, been shaving my head with it for a week and haven't cut or nicked myself a single time. I really like this razor!

I actually like the razor blade, but they aren't my favorite. This isn't my first safety razor, and I'm happy with the quality so far. I like this design, as I've gone through a few of the butterfly design razors. Those razors end up getting stuck and breaking on me. I would highly recommend this product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW

The razor itself is great, but does take some getting used to. The first time I used it I nicked myself quite a few times, but by the second time I was already getting the hang of it. Now I'm a pro after only a month or so! I still haven't used all of the blades that it came with. I love the color of the razor, and the case it comes with a definitely nice for traveling. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Fenstermaker

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this for anyone looking for a step up from ...

I would highly recommend it to someone looking for a good and clean shave. I find it gets near the nose and the lips without doing damage and there is no blood letting in this little razor. Far superior to your multi blade cartridge systems. Am happy to have found it.

customer_reviews.title: but I think it was because I didn't use a good enough soap
customer_reviews.text: Got a little bit of razor burn, but I think it was because I didn't use a good enough soap. This blade is wonderful. Close shave WITH the grain and so much more eco-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: The best shave I’ve had since I started shaving
customer_reviews.text: The best shave I’ve had since I started shaving! Close comfortable shave and not a nick in sight. I love the weight to it, it feels sturd and the pressure of the razors weight alone does all the work. I’m extremely pleased and will absolutely be buying more Bigfoot Shaves products in the future. Coming from trying so many disposable cartridge brands on the market, this is an impressively marked improvement. I highly recommend this for anyone that wants to save themselves from razorburn and overspending on disposables. Plus, it’s utterly gentlemanlike and will make you cooler than your buddies. Bravo! P.S. The velvet lined case in came in was the icing on the cake.

customer_reviews.title: Great for ladies
customer_reviews.text: I love this razor and will never go back to disposable. It's easy to use and clean. I have had no nicks or cuts and it reduces rashers burn and bumps. I can do my arm pits with one pass and no need to shave against the grain anymore which really reduces rash and ingrown hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Telleria

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I know these razors aren't marketed to women, but I followed the guidelines when I used this to shave my legs. I was amazed at how little pressure I needed to use- I'd usually have to press quite firmly with multi-blade razors- and I still got an incredibly close shave. It takes a few tries to get used to it, but it's an excellent razor.

I was getting frequent ingrown hairs with the multi-blade razors, and I haven't got one yet using this. The guide helps so you don't hack your face up. Also new replacement razors are super cheap. I'd highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre - Go with a Stainless or Above the Tie Instead
customer_reviews.text: Been shaving with straight's and safety razors for about 5 years now. Broke my Muhle by dropping it on tile so got this as a temporary. Not a fan of the weight, the angle of the blade, and the included razors are terrible. For the price, it's about what I expected. The travel case is cool though and in the meantime the head does screw onto Muhle R89 base to give it more heft.

customer_reviews.title: Great razor, great price!

customer_reviews.title: This one is great. I got a close shave and the hardware ...

I got a close shave and the hardware is well made. I showed my sons how to use it and they were completely enthralled with the whole process. The product is well made looks amazing. I would recommend it to anyone and everyone!
customer_reviews.author: ErikTop Contributor: Board Games

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product for Women, Too!

I desperately wanted something to work, and this answered that want. The tips they send to you via email are truly helpful, so watch the videos and read the tutorials. I use this razor everywhere. Never again will I buy a plastic razor.
customer_reviews.author: CNMCC

customer_reviews.title: good mild shave for beginning de users
customer_reviews.text: The razor is very heavy in weight, and the build quality very decent for the price. The included blades are some Chinese brand, that gives a very safe and mild shave. Make sure you tighten the razor completely after putting your blade in, to get the maximum blade angle, and let the weight of the razor do all the work, apply no external pressure. The razor has no guard, so you need to be careful shaving, but the mild blade also helps keep your face safe. I got no cuts on my first ever shave with this razor. Overall this blade is very good for a beginner, if you invest the time needed for a safe first shave with it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Reimer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful razor kit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice travel razor kit. Glad I purchased it. Received it today and have already used it. Great razor for women as well. Got tired of buying the disposable razors with the moisturizing strip, which caused bumps and rashes to my sensitive skin. Ladies don't be afraid to buy this kit for yourself.
